English: to warm up the baby bottle
What if the milk won't rise?
hungarian: Mi van, ha a tej nem emelkedik fel?

English: When will my milk come in?

Finnish: Vauva herää noin 3-4 tunnin välein syömään.
English: The baby wakes up about every 3-4 hours to eat.
The baby is only getting milk to eat.
hungarian: A baba csak tejes táplálékot kap.
A szoptatás nem indult be azonnal.

English: The baby spits up part of the milk.
hungarian: A baba lenyeli a tej egy részét.

English: Remember to burp the baby after eating.
hungarian: Ne felejtse el böfögni a babát étkezés után.

English: I freeze the extra breast milk.
Could you heat the baby bottle?
The baby eats from a spoon.
Would you change the baby's diaper?
The baby needs a nappy change.
The washing machine spins day and night.
My daughter enjoys being in the bath.
Is the bath water warm enough?

Finnish: Pese vauvan pylly juoksevan veden alla.
English: Wash the baby's bum under running water.
hungarian: Mossa meg a baba fenekét folyó víz alatt.

English: Babies sleep for the majority of the time.
hungarian: A babák az idő nagy részében alszanak.

English: Try to sleep when your baby sleeps.
hungarian: Próbáljon meg aludni, amikor a baba alszik.

English: I try to rest when my child sleeps.
hungarian: Próbálok pihenni, amikor a gyermekem alszik.

English: The baby falls asleep immediately in the pram.
hungarian: A baba azonnal elalszik a babakocsiban

English: The child falls asleep in the sitter.
Small babies have to sleep on their back.
hungarian: A kisbabáknak a hátukon kell aludniuk

English: The child sleeps through the night already.
hungarian: A gyerek már átalussza az éjszakát.

Finnish: Vauva herää muutaman tunnin välein syömään.
English: The baby wakes up every few hours to eat.
hungarian: A baba néhány óránként felébred enni.

English: The baby will probably wake up soon.
Sound can be heard from the baby monitor.
Has the bany woken up yet?

Finnish: Vauva torkahti mutta säpsähti sitten hereille.
English: The baby snoozed but then startled awake.
hungarian: A baba elszunnyadt, de aztán felébredt.

English: Does the baby have a wet diaper?
Does the baby have stomach aches?
I don't know what my baby's problem is.
hungarian: Nem tudom mi a baja a babámnak.

English: My daughter is very tearful today.
The baby's crying makes my heart break.
hungarian: A baba sírása összetörte a szívem.

English: I was crying along with the baby.
The baby calmed down when he got the pacifier.
hungarian: A baba megnyugodott, amikor megkapta a cumit.

English: I can't calm my baby down.
The father's touch calms the baby down.
hungarian: Az apa érintése megnyugtatja a babát.

English: I'm worried about my baby's well-being.
I want to go to the maternity clinic.
Maybe they can help in the maternity clinic.
The baby has reached his/her birth weight.
The baby sucks on the pacifier.
The girl turns from her stomach to her back.
hungarian: A lány hasról a hátára fordul.

English: The boy is able to turn from his back to his stomach.
hungarian: A fiú a hátáról a hasára fordulhat.

English: The baby can sit without support.
The baby has learned to crawl.
My child has taken his first steps.
My child is a little anxious around strangers.
My child has started being anxious around strangers.
Is everything okay with the baby?
My baby is always in a good mood in the morning.
hungarian: Reggelente mindig jó hangulatban van a babám.

English: I need time to recover from childbirth.
hungarian: Időre van szükségem, hogy felépüljek a szülésből.

Finnish: Vauva haluaa olla koko ajan sylissä.
English: The baby wants to be held all the time.
hungarian: A baba állandóan kézben akarja tartani.

English: There were cute clothes in the maternity package.
hungarian: Aranyos ruhák voltak a kismama csomagban.

English: Luckily my husband is on paternity leave.
hungarian: Szerencsére a férjem apasági szabadságon van.

English: My husband helps a lot with caring for the baby
hungarian: A férjem sokat segít a babagondozásban.

English: My partner is returning to work soon.
After maternity leave,I will be on home care leave.
hungarian: A szülési szabadság után szülési szabadságon leszek.

Finnish: Aion jäädä kotiin kunnes lapseni on 3.
English: I plan to stay at home until my child is 3.
hungarian: Úgy tervezem, hogy a gyermekem 3 éves koráig otthon maradok.

English: Maternity leave lasts for about 4 months.
hungarian: A szülési szabadság körülbelül 4 hónapig tart.

English: The father is staying home to take care of the child.
hungarian: Az apa otthon marad, hogy vigyázzon a gyerekre.

English: I will soon return to working life.
